backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that stores a conversation history of user/assistant messages and exposes functions to send a message (returning a simulated AI response) and retrieve the full history.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two implemented features—the chat UI and the futuristic dark-mode theme—to their associated source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document providing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a quick reference for the project's frontend structure.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes used throughout the shadcn/ui component system.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the ChatInterface as the sole view of the application.
frontend/src/components/ChatInput.tsx: Auto-resizing textarea input component with a send button, Enter-to-send keyboard support, and neon green focus/hover styling.
frontend/src/components/ChatInterface.ts: Main chat layout component composing the header, scrollable message thread, typing indicator, empty state, input bar, and clear-conversation button.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders individual chat messages with user messages right-aligned and AI messages left-aligned, including timestamps and neon glow styling.
Displays an animated three-dot typing indicator with the AI avatar and neon green staggered bounce animation while awaiting a response.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useChat.ts: Custom hook managing chat state with optimistic user messages, typing indicator, send/clear actions, and composition of backend query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state and persisting identity via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching conversation history, sending messages, and clearing local conversation state via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Space Grotesk/Mono fonts, defining Tailwind base layers, dark-mode CSS custom properties, and neon glow utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with custom fonts, oklch-based color tokens, neon box-shadow utilities, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, existing features, and pending feature requests for an AI Assistant chat application built on ICP.
